xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescriptionOfBusinessActivity: Manufacturing and Sale of Caustic Soda, Caustic Potash, and their bye products
Manufacturing andSale of various Industrial Chemicals
Manufacturing andSale of Sugar and its bye products
Manufacturing andSale of Aspirin, Salicylic Acid
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:ABriefOnTypesOfCustomersExplan: The Customers served by the Company for its products include mainly Chemicals and Pharmaceutical industries, Public Sector enterprises, Central and State Government institutions, dealers and retailers in India and Export of the product Aspirin to European Countries, USA and Australia.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Reduction of pollution and protection of the environment.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: The company proposes for sourcing up of renewableenergy like Solar, Green Hydrogen etc. that will help in reducing Gree House Gases (GHG) emissions.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Continuous drop in the availability of Sugar Cane.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: Sourcing of sugarcane producedthrough sustainable farming. practices viz., Mechanisation of Plantation and Harvesting, Timely payment to farmers and payment of Cane price more than the FRP fixed by Govt.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Power being one of the Major inputs for Chlor Alkali and other Segments.Availability of Quality Power at reasonable price is always a matter of concern. The company has setup Coal Based captive Power Plant for augmenting power requirements for its captive use.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: To effectively manage the risks associated with energy management, the company is undertaking the following approaches: 1. Energy Efficiency efforts: Implementing energy-efficient technologies, equipment upgrades, and process optimization to minimize energy consumption. 2. To reduce reliance on non-renewable energy sources. 3. Renewable Energy Integration: Exploring and investing in renewable energy sources, such as solar and Green Hydrogen to diversify the energy mix and decrease dependence on fossil fuels.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: Prices of the Imported Raw Materials are highly volatile. Further volatility in the segments where the Company’s products are sold is always a matter of concern.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:InCaseOfRiskApproachToAdaptOrM: To address the risks associated with volatile market trends, the company is implementing the following approach: i.e., Diversification of Customer Base and to enhance supply chain resilience and exploring various possibilities for reducing costs of Key elements such as power etc. and investing continuously in Technology advancement.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:RationaleForIdentifyingTheRisk: The Company has been spending for the development of Education and Health Care even before CSR has been made mandatory. As a part of CSR obligation, key areas of CSR activities for the year 2023-24 include: 1. Health Care 2.Environmental Sustainability 3. Safe Drinking Water
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:NameOfTheNationalAndInternatio: Note * (i) The Company has adopted a Safety and health policy across all its Manufacturing units. (ii)Chemicals Division at Saggonda and Aspirin Division at Tanuku have been certified for ISO 9001:2008, ISO 14001: 2018 and ISO45001:2018Management System. (iii) Aspirin unit of the Company has been qualified under GMP EDQM, USFDA, TGA. (iv) Major facilities have FSSAI – Food Safety &Standards Authority of India,Food Safety Systems Certification (FSSC 22000).v) BIS Certification has been obtained for the applicable products as per the Statutory and Customers requirement.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:StatementByDirectorResponsible: At ASL,weareextremelycarefulofusingtherightproportionofresourcesandcaringsustainably. We have adopted the triple bottom line approach, which includes Environment, Society and Governance (ESG), to evaluate our performance and value creation. We are relentlessly looking for innovative solutions to reduce our environmental footprint and enhance sustainability into our operations.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfSpecifiedCommitteeOfT: The Company hasCorporate Social Responsibility andRiskManagementCommittees of the Board which reviews, monitors and provides strategic direction to the Company’s CSR andsustainabilitypracticestowards fulfilling its objectives. The Committees seeks to guide the Company to support creation of sustainable livelihoods together with environmental protection.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:TopicsOrPrinciplesCoveredUnder: The Directors of the Company are briefed on the sustainability initiatives of the Company fromtimetotime.TheDirectorsarealsoupdatedonchanges/developmentsinthedomestic/ global corporate and industry scenario including those pertaining to statutes/legislation & economicenvironmentandonmattersaffectingtheCompany,toenablethemtotakewell informed and timely decisions.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:AntiCorruptionOrAntiBriberyPol: The Company’s Code of Conduct covers aspects relating to anti-corruption or anti-bribery. In terms ofthe said Code, the Company believes in conducting its business in a transparent manner and does not indulgeinbriberyorcorruption.The ASLCodeofConductcanbeaccessedontheCompany’scorporate website at: www.theandhrasugars.com.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfImprovementsInEnviron: Farmers have been migrating to sustainable farming practices with the Mechanized Sugar Cane Harveste
Farmers have been migrating to sustainable farming practices with the Mechanized Sugar Cane Harveste
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheProcessesInPlaceToS: The waste generated during the process is being treated/disposed as per the directions of the Pollution Control Board. Specific waste which is required to be disposed of through Authorized Agents is being sent to them. For Hazardous waste the relevant returns are filed to the respective regulatory authorities from time to time.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfMechanismAvailableToR: ASL ’s Grievance Redressal Procedureis available to employees and workers. The objective of the policy is to facilitate open and structured discussion on employees’ work-related grievances with the intent of ensuring that the grievance is dealt with in a fair and just manner whilst being in compliance with the Company’s policies.Further ASL’s open door practices encourage an amicable and fair resolution of grievances. Employees are encouraged to first discuss the grievance with their immediate reporting authority, and attempt to arrive at a resolution before invoking a formal grievance redressal mechanism.

Employees are encouraged to first discuss the grievance with their immediate reporting authority, and attempt to arrive at a resolution before invoking a formal grievance redressal mechanism.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfOccupationalHealthAnd: The organization has been implementing IS45001 standard for Occupational Health and Safety Management System for Aspirin Plant only. For other plants general safety systems are being practiced in line with OHS policy of the organization.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DesclosureOfTheProcessesUsedTo: The company conducts Hazop and Risk Assessment studies to identify the risks involved in the operations and to mitigate the same.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMeasuresTakenByTheE: a) Provided safe, healthy, and secure work conditions for employees and workers b) Designed a Health and Safety Management System continually to improve our performance and actively manage risk. c) Communicate openly with all Employees and workers on relevant health and safety issues. d) Ensured strict following of all applicable legal, regulatory, industry requirements. e) Our aim is zero harm f) Compliances on Renewal of Fire License / PVs / Crane & Sling Inspection / Pollution Control Board / Building Stability / PESO.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheProcessesForIdentif: Yes,the Company has mapped its stakeholders asapar to fit sstakeholder engagement strategy in the development process. ASL engages with a broad spectrum of stakeholders, to deepen its insights in to their needs and expectations, and to develop sustainable strategies for the medium and long term. Stakeholder engagement also helps to manage risks and opportunities in business operations. The key stakeholders identified in consultation with the company’s management areCustomers, Employees, Shareholders, suppliers,Business Collaborators, Industry Bodies such as AMAI, ISMA, FICCI and CII, Local Communities and Regulators.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfOtherChannelsOfCommun: We have designated officers and team at unit level for CSR and sustainability initiatives.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:PurposeAndScopeOfEngagementInc: All CSR activities of the Company are oriented towards wellbeing of the surrounding communities.
Information exchange to address sustainability issues.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfOtherChannelsOfCommun: General meetings - AnnualReport - BRSReport - Other information
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfOtherFrequencyOfEngag: Quarterly, Annually and as and when required
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:PurposeAndScopeOfEngagementInc: The Company engages with all its stakeholders. It helps to enrich business conduct by understanding their priorities and addressing their queries and concerns.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfOtherChannelsOfCommun: Annual report andregulatory filings - Facility Inspections - One-on-One meetings
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfOtherFrequencyOfEngag: Annually /Quarterly /Monthly and as and when required
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:PurposeAndScopeOfEngagementInc: Good governance practice; community engagement; regulatory compliance; environmental initiatives.
Employee engagement is a non-going exercise. conducted throughout the year.
To understand and enrich the required practices for better management and sustainability.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheInternalMechanismsI: Grievance redressal Committee of the units and General Manager (HR) at Head Office under the supervision of Joint Managing Director and Chairman and Managing Director will take care of the Human Rights issues.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:MechanismsToPreventAdverseCons: The Whistle Blower & Protection Policy implemented by ASL includes a provision that emphasizes the confidentiality of complainants and protection against victimization.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DiscloseWhetherTargetsSetUnder:
Our Chlor Alkali Facility at Saggonda is identified as Designated Consumer under the PAT Scheme.We have achieved the target set under PAT scheme in PAT Cycle-I and got the ES Certificates from BEE. Whereas in PAT Cycle-II, we have not achieved the Target set under the PAT scheme.
We are continuously improving our process to reduce the Energy consumption. In this process, we are replacing the Membranes of the electrolysers, Recoating of Electrodes on timely basis.We are installing Variable Frequency Drives wherever possible to reduce the Energy Consumption.
We have commissioned 400 TPD Caustic Evaporation plant to minimize the Thermal energy requirement for the concentration of Caustic Soda from 32% to 50%.
We are proposing to install a Turbine to Generate Electricity from the waste steam generated from our Sulphuric Acid Plant.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:NameOfTheExternalAgencyIfAnyIn: Evaluation carried out by SV Enviro Engineers (NABL & NABET Accredited Agency) for Ambient Air Quality and Stack Emissions.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfProjectRelatedToReduc: 1.The CO2 gas produced as a byproduct from our Distillery is purified and used in the production of Salicylic Acid. 2. A 2.8 MW Solar Power Plant has been established at Kovvuru location. 3. 16.625 MW capacity Windmills have been established at various locations
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfWasteManagementPracti: We have adopted reduce, reuse, and recycle concepts in waste management.The waste generated in our complex is broadly categorized into different types of wastes viz. solid waste and liquid waste.The solid waste generated is further segregated into incinerable waste and land fill waste.Incinerable waste like spent carbon is recycled to cement industries for co-processing / authorized recyclers. The other hazardous waste (land fillable) is sent to TSDF, Parawada. Part of the land fillable waste is being disposed in houses in the secured land fill facility. Waste oil and e-waste are disposed to authorized recyclers. Used lead acid batteries are disposed to the battery manufacturers on a buy back basis. Our Company is encouraging the usage of non-asbestos roof sheets in place of hazardous asbestos roof sheets for the structural buildings. Depending on the nature of the liquid wastes, they are treated using different types ofpollution control technologies, such as anaerobic and aerobic treatment systems, reverse osmosis and multiple effect evaporation systems and making them zero liquid discharge where-ever possible.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:NameOfTheTradeAndIndustryChamb: Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI)
Federation of Telangana Chamber of Commerce and Industry
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMechanismsToReceive: Company’s societal initiatives are structured in a way to get feedback on the interventions and understand if communities have any views, issues, complaints, and grievances related to these interventions. During 2023 -24, no grievances were brought to the Company’s notice. Detailed and structured community engagements are planned periodically to revisit the changing needs of the community and the emerging priorities feed into designing and re-designing of ongoing and new programs.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMechanismsInPlaceTo: ASL’’ customers are provided with multiple mechanism store port complaints or feedback. The company regularly conducts meetings with customers to educate, appraise and understand their concerns. All the concerns are taken up and resolved immediately to the satisfaction of the customers.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:ReasonsForVoluntaryRecall: No Product recall on account of Safety Issues.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:ReasonsForForcedRecall: No Product recall on account of Safety Issues.
